snippet.shortDescription: Belarusian photographer and public figure, Honored Worker of Culture of the Republic of Belarus, teacher of the history of photography.

biography.title: Born in the city of Petrokrepost (Shlisselburg in the Kirov district of the Leningrad region from 1944 to 1992, the USSR
After graduating from high school in the city of Lipetsk, he studied at the Penza Polytechnic Institute with a degree in Computer Engineering
In an all-union competition, he got to the Minsk Central Research Institute of Technical University and moved to Minsk, and before that he worked in a defense enterprise in Penza
Author and presenter of the TV series “Photopanorama” on BT
He was the chairman and artistic director of the photo club «Мінск»
Received the title «Honored Worker of Culture of the Republic of Belarus»
Became a member of the Belarusian public association «Photography» (creative union), member of the Council of BOO

workList.title: Participation in the exhibition «Man and the Sea» (Yugoslavia)
Participation in the inter-republican portrait exhibition in Šiauliai (Lithuania)
Participation in the All-Union Exhibition «Lens and Life» (Москва)
Participation in the All-Union Exhibition of Photography dedicated to the 40th anniversary of the Victory over fascism
ІІ-th All-Union Festival of Folk Art (Moscow)
выступил с made a presentation «Belarusian hats of Jan Bulgak» at the Seminars in Vilnius

mapPlace.title: Born in the city of Petrokrepost of the Leningrad Region
Vilnius - Yu. Vasiliev made a presentation «Беларускi шлях Яна Булгака» at the International Seminar (2007)
